snippet: The tight quarters at Martinsville Speedway got the better of the race frontrunners, Jimmie Johnson and Jeff Gordon, which allowed Newman to capitalize with two laps remaining.
abstract: The tight quarters at Martinsville Speedway got the better of the race frontrunners, Jimmie Johnson and Jeff Gordon, which allowed Newman to capitalize with two laps remaining.

headline.main: Monday Motorsports: Ryan Newman Clears Wild Restart to Win at Martinsville
